about_the_game:
With Garden Simulator you’ll get your own allotment, place deco elements and cultivate plants to harvest and sell them. Create beds, plant vegetables, fruits and flowers, mow the lawn, water your plants and decorate according to your wishes and ideas.

This guide will help you create a beautiful garden. It is intended to serve as a reference when you have problems in the game and get stuck. It also offers helpful tips and tricks to make your game easier.

Content
  • Settings
  • Controls
  • Shop Items (seeds, accessories, tools, deco elements, etc.)
  • First Steps
  • Abilities
  • Tools And How To Use Them
  • Plant Compendium

Access
You can find the Official Guide in the Steam installation directory of the game in the "Official Garden Guide Content " folder (Steam\steamapps\common\Garden Simulator\Official Guide Content) after the download of the "Official Guide" DLC pack is complete.

Note: Only availabe in English and German language.
